languages.text: {n}Друкари с каменным лицом отмахивается от Винтерскейла, едва не ударив того по пальцам.{/n} "Увольте. Я слишком долго привыкал к одн{mf|ому|ой} мон-ка{mf|ю|й}, чтобы начинать этот унылый процесс с начала".
{n}Marazhai coolly brushes him off, nearly slapping away his fingers.{/n} "Spare me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to begin the tedious process anew."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари с каменным лицом отмахивается от Винтерскейла, едва не ударив того по пальцам.{/n} "Увольте. Я слишком долго привыкал к одн{mf|ому|ой} мон-ка{mf|ю|й}, чтобы начинать этот унылый процесс с начала".

traits.locale_text: {n}Keeping a straight face, the Drukhari waves off Winterscale, almost hitting the latter's fingers.{/n} "Dismiss me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to start this dull process over again."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Keeping a straight face, the Drukhari waves off Winterscale, almost hitting the latter's fingers.{/n} "Dismiss me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to start this dull process over again."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lo rechaza con un gesto de la mano que casi le golpea en los dedos.{/n} «Basta. He tardado demasiado en acostumbrarme a un{mf||a} mon-keigh como para volver a empezar este tedioso ritual desde cero».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai coolly brushes him off, nearly slapping away his fingers.{/n} "Spare me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to begin the tedious process anew."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin inmutarse lo más mínimo, el Drukhari rechaza a Winterscale con un gesto de la mano que casi le golpea en los dedos.{/n} «Basta. He tardado demasiado en acostumbrarme a un mon-keigh como para volver a empezar este tedioso ritual desde cero».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋冷淡地挥了挥手，几乎要碰到卡里戈斯的手指。{/n}“饶了我吧，我花了很长时间才习惯了一只猴子，我可不想再重新开始这无聊的过程。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai coolly brushes him off, nearly slapping away his fingers.{/n} "Spare me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to begin the tedious process anew."

traits.locale_text: {n}黑暗灵族板着脸，朝温特斯凯尔挥了挥手，几乎要打到他的手指。{/n}“饶了我吧，我花了很长时间才习惯了一只猴子。我可不想再重新开始这无聊的过程。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Toujours impassible, Marazhai chasse Calligos d'un geste de la main qui manque de justesse de toucher les doigts du libre-marchand.{/n} « Sans façon. J'ai passé trop de temps à m'habituer à {mf|un|une} mon-keigh pour recommencer le même cirque. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai coolly brushes him off, nearly slapping away his fingers.{/n} "Spare me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to begin the tedious process anew."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toujours impassible, Marazhai chasse Calligos d'un geste de la main qui manque de justesse de toucher les doigts du libre-marchand.{/n} « Sans façon. J'ai passé trop de temps à m'habituer à {mf|un|une} mon-keigh pour recommencer le même cirque. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、ほとんどその指を払い除けるような格好で、落ち着いて彼を退けた。{/n}「勘弁してくれよ。こんな退屈なことをまたやるには、モン＝ケイ1人に馴染むのに時間がかかりすぎた」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai coolly brushes him off, nearly slapping away his fingers.{/n} "Spare me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to begin the tedious process anew."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは表情を帰ることなくウィンタースケールを振り払う。{/n}「勘弁してくれよ。こんな退屈なことをやり直すには、モン＝ケイの流儀に慣れるのに時間がかかりすぎた」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai erteilt ihm kühle eine Abfuhr und schlägt beinahe seiner Finger beiseite.{/n} "Verschont mich. Ich habe schon zu viel Zeit damit verbracht, mich daran zu gewöhnen, dass ein Chem-Pan-Sey den ermüdenden Prozess von Neuem beginnt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai coolly brushes him off, nearly slapping away his fingers.{/n} "Spare me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to begin the tedious process anew."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit regloser Miene winkt der Drukhari Winterzunder fort und schlägt ihm dabei fast auf die Finger.{/n} "Verschont mich. Ich habe schon zu viel Zeit investiert, um mich an einen Chem-Pan-Sey zu gewöhnen, ich will diesen öden Prozess nicht erneut durchlaufen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, Calligos'u neredeyse parmaklarıyla çarparak küstah bir şekilde başından savıyor.{/n} "Hiç almayayım. Bir mon-keigh'e alışmak için bu zahmetli sürece baştan başlayamayacak kadar çok zaman harcadım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai coolly brushes him off, nearly slapping away his fingers.{/n} "Spare me. I spent too long getting used to one mon-keigh to begin the tedious process anew."
